j.base.errorhandler¶

Source

exceptHook¶

  • params: ttype,pythonExceptionObject,tb
  • path:/base/ERRORHANDLER.py (line:16)

every fatal error in jumpscale or by python itself will result in an exception in this function the exception is caught. This routine will create an errorobject & escalate to the infoserver
